attributes.action: stop immigration, as not everyone currently has job's and houseing in the uk.
attributes.additional_details: recent news articals of immagrants rapeing people, of choping heads off, of homeless people in the street's, of people having to go on the brew since they have no way of getting a job, and on the unfairness that when they come in they get a house almost immediatly, not only that the way they treat people already here and act towards us
attributes.background: immagrants are coming into the uk taking job's house's, some even rape and kill and get away with it, i for one think that they shouldn't allow them into the country, and all that does do something wrong get's deported, and also some of the people in the uk have no house's or jobs, but immigrants do
